name: Winter Exile
description:
It's a simple top down 2d survival shooter. 

controls:

open chest/loot the corpses: tab

shooting: mouse left (short weapon), mouse right (long weapon)

use a knife: space

warm up (use heating system): Q

eat: E (you can also left click on an icon in the equipment menu)

charge: C  (you can also left click on an icon in the equipment menu)

heal: left shift  (you can also left click on an icon in the equipment menu)

turn the torch on/off: middle mouse button

Soldier sprites that I use: Animated Top Down Survivor Player | OpenGameArt.org

side notes: As for now the game might be a bit too hard sometimes - random enemies tend to be a real pain in the a** for the player. After all - it's a survival, the goal was to make it hard.

There are also a few bugs I ve noticed, but don't have a lot of time to fix them now. I hope to fix them in a future.
